attributes.action: Ask the Premier League to drop proposals to stage league matches overseas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Premier League football clubs are considering a proposal to stage regular league matches overseas.

This proposal would further increase distance between football clubs and the ordinary fans that pay for them.  The integrity of the competition would be compromised for the sake of the clubs creating another source of revenue.

The move may also have a disproportionate impact on clubs in the countries where the games are staged, by diverting much-need sponsorship and attendance receipts from local clubs to the much larger and wealthier English clubs. 

For further information see:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/football/eng_prem/7232390.stm
